TEST 01:
0x210.456p14  = 8655192.0
DoubToBin:  1.0000100000100010101100000000000000000000000000000000 * 2^23
OnlineConv: 1000001000101011000 * 2^23

0x210           = 528
0x.456          = 0.27099609375
0x210.456       = 528.27099609375
			    ≡ 1000010000.01000101011
0x210456        = 1000010000010001010110

0x210.456p14    = 528.27099609375 * 2¹⁴
                ≡ 1000010000.01000101011 * 2¹⁴
			    ≡ 1.00001000001000101011 * 2⁻⁹ * 2¹⁴
			    ≡ 1.00001000001000101011 * 2²³
IEEE flt 0 10010110 00001000001000101011000
	     | |        \_ mantissa: 266584
	     | \__________ bias:     150
	     \____________ sign:     pos
TEST 02:
0x1.921fb54442d18p1 = 3.141592653589793
DoubToBin:  1.1001001000011111101101010100010001000010110100011 * 2^1
OnlineConv: 1.10010010000111111011011                           * 2^1

0x1                 = 1
0x.921fb54442d18    = 0.5707963267948966
                    ≡ 0.1001001000011111101101010100010001000010110100011
0x1.921fb54442d18   = 1.5707963267948966
					≡ 1.1001001000011111101101010100010001000010110100011
0x1921fb54442d18    ≡  11001001000011111101101010100010001000010110100011000

					≡ 1.1001001000011111101101010100010001000010110100011 * 2^1
